definition: reaching heaven in a single bound (idiom); (esp. with negative: don't expect) instant success
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
surname Bu

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
day/sky/heaven

sentences.english: It’s important to keep your cool and don’t push yourself too far.
sentences.chinese: 保持冷靜切忌一步登天也非常重要。

sentences.english: Expect success, plan to achieve it and plan to exceed it right from the early stages of your business planning.
sentences.chinese: 一步登天，以圖達到和超過它計劃從您業務初期規劃。

sentences.english: Not to do things to lay a solid foundation, great cause difficult to attain the highest level in one step.
sentences.chinese: 沒有做小事打下牢固基礎，大事業難以一步登天。

sentences.english: Don't dream of reaching success by one step.
sentences.chinese: 要成功不好諗住一步登天。

definition: to rapidly go up in the world/meteoric rise (of a career, social position etc)
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
rising straight up in a clear sky (idiom); rapid promotion to a high post/meteoric career
seat of honor/person in a high-ranking position/to be promoted to a more senior role/(genetics) epistatic
to stand out among one's peers (idiom)/to excel
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking
lit. to want to get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. to try to achieve one's goal in the shortest time possible/to be impatient for success
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 ge5 pang4 zi5

definition: to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
shortcut
to be promoted and gain wealth (idiom)
to have boundless prospects
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

definition: stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
to make a breakthrough
to get promoted
